Are your Windows
CLOUDY
Condensated Damaged

We can fully renovate your old window units FOR LESS THAN YOU THINK

Are you window units looking a little tired? Do they appear cloudy or condensate regularly? Perhaps they don’t close properly and are energy inefficient? Or are they damaged in any way?

Here at Tom Watson UPVC we’re experts in renovating old window units into their former glory.

We can repair your old UPVC window units to as new condition with A rated energy efficient glass from as little as £20 per unit. So why go through the expense and mess of having new windows installed if you don’t have to?

Contact us today for a FREE no obligation assessment and quote, by calling 07929 717159. We could save you a fortune!

  • Windows

    We supply and fit a wide range of UPVC, aluminium and composite windows. We source quality products from top brands including Kommerling and Pilkington, with lengthy guarantees for your added peace of mind.

  • Doors

    From front doors, to bi-folds, sliding doors to French doors, we supply and fit a wide range of UPVC, aluminium and composite doors. Our prices are very competitive with access to all the major brands, so call us for your free quote today.

  • Orangeries

    An orangery or conservatory is one of the most cost effective ways to give your home some extra space. We construct a wide variety of orangeries and conservatories, from the ultra modern to classical, so give us a call today and we’ll be happy to discuss your project.

  • Roofline

    Maintaining wood fascia and soffits can be a laborious task, so why not upgrade your existing roofline to a new UPVC or composite system. We supply and install guttering, fascia, soffits, dry verge systems and much more in a huge range of colours and finishes to suit your home.

We use quality products from top brands
